images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a tropical beach at sunset with vibrant colors.
AI-selected These images will highlight the autumn experience in Thailand, showcasing serene beach scenes and autumn festivals that reflect the low tourist season.
AI-selected These images will highlight the autumn experience in Thailand, showcasing serene beach scenes and autumn festivals that reflect the low tourist season.
AI-selected Promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to autumn travel to Thailand.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trust in the promotional email.
AI-selected A background pattern that complements the tropical theme will enhance the overall aesthetic of the email.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A tropical beach at sunset, showcasing the beauty of Thailand during autumn with bright colors and a sense of freedom.
Visuals of autumn festivals and soft weather in Thailand, emphasizing lower tourist crowds.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в тропики! Осенние билеты в Тайланд от 47 424 ₽. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a tropical beach at sunset with vibrant colors.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
